      • showDetailsForScenarios

        @GET
@Path(value="scenario/{scenarioID}/")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showDetailsForScenarios(@PathParam(value="scenarioID")
                                                                  int scenarioID)
        GET information about an activityID
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - the ID of the related scenario
        Returns:
        returns JSON containing details for scenarios

      • showScenarioInstances

        @GET
@Path(value="scenario/{scenarioID}/instance/{instanceID}/")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showScenarioInstances(@PathParam(value="scenarioID")
                                                                int scenarioID,
                                                                @PathParam(value="instanceID")
                                                                int instanceID)
        GET all scenarioInstanceIDs of a scenario
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - the ID of the related scenario
        instanceID - the ID of the related scenario instance
        Returns:
        details for a scenario instance or a error code

      • showDetailsForActivity

        @GET
@Path(value="scenario/{scenarioID}/instance/{instanceID}/activityinstance/{activityinstanceID}/")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showDetailsForActivity(@PathParam(value="scenarioID")
                                                                 int scenarioID,
                                                                 @PathParam(value="instanceID")
                                                                 int instanceID,
                                                                 @PathParam(value="activityinstanceID")
                                                                 int activityinstanceID,
                                                                 @QueryParam(value="status")
                                                                 java.lang.String status,
                                                                 @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                 java.lang.String limit)
        GET details for an activityID
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - the ID of the related scenario
        instanceID - the ID of the related scenario instance
        activityinstanceID - the ID of the related activity instance
        status - the new status of the activity which is supposed to be updated
        limit - a limit which is not used yet but defined through API specs
        Returns:
        details for an activity

        TODO: Limit has to be implemented

      • showDataObjects

        @GET
@Path(value="scenario/{scenarioID}/instance/{instanceID}/dataobject/{dataobjectID}/")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showDataObjects(@PathParam(value="scenarioID")
                                                          int scenarioID,
                                                          @PathParam(value="instanceID")

                                                          @PathParam(value="dataobjectID")
                                                          int dataobjectID,
                                                          @QueryParam(value="status")
                                                          java.lang.String status,
                                                          @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                          java.lang.String limit)
        GET Dataobjects and States
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - the ID of the related scenario
        scenarioInstanceID - the ID of the related scenario instance
        status - the new status of the activity which is supposed to be updated
        Returns:
        json representation of all available dataobjects

      • doActivity

        @POST
@Path(value="scenario/{scenarioID}/instance/{instanceID}/activityinstance/{activityinstanceID}/")
public java.lang.Boolean doActivity(@PathParam(value="scenarioID")

                                     @PathParam(value="instanceID")
                                     int scenarioInstanceID,
                                     @PathParam(value="activityinstanceID")

                                     @QueryParam(value="status")
                                     java.lang.String status)
        POST to change status of an activity
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - the ID of the related scenario
        scenarioInstanceID - the ID of the related scenario instance
        activityInstanceID - the ID of the related activity instance
        status - the new status of the activity which is supposed to be updated
        Returns:
        true or false

      • updateEmailConfiguration

        @POST
@Consumes(value="application/json")
@Path(value="config/emailtask/{emailtaskID}/")
public boolean updateEmailConfiguration(@PathParam(value="emailtaskID")
                                                  int emailtaskID,
                                                  RestConnection.EmailConfigJaxBean input)
        Parameters:
        emailtaskID - id of related emailtask
        input - HTTP body as json which is retrieved by the REST interface

        boolean
